Strings.Text:
It's a shutter to close the 
waterways.{pause}{clear}You can hear the low sound of 
the machines.{pause}{clear}It doesn't seem like the 
machines are stopping.{pause}
The pipe of the oxygen supply \nhas been cut or chewed off {pause}{clear}from the back of his diving suit.{pause}
You have found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
